name: Survival of the Helpless
description:
My submission for the Digital Game Design category for the Forsyth County Technology Fair is called Survival of the Helpless, a play on word of the popular saying, "Survival Of The Fittest." This game is about protecting a defenseless wolf. In most runner games, the user directly controls the player character, but in order to stress the defenseless wolf aspect, the user controls the obstacles instead. There is a playable version of the game above, as well as a downloadable below for MacOS and Windows. Please feel free to leave constructive criticism in the comment section below.

*I can not test out whether or not the windows download works*
